data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_6abf0c552b59b8ca4cbc1af3662ef176.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Helcurt remains in <font color="a6aafb">Prowler</font> state until spotted by the enemy team, gaining 15% extra Movement Speed, and continuously regenerating <font color="fba51f"> (+30% Total Physical Attack)</font> HP if he has not dealt any damage.
He gains 50% extra Attack Speed and 50% extra Movement Speed (decreasing over time) for 4s upon being spotted and leaves <font color="a6aafb">Prowler</font> state 0.75s later.
Any hero killed after being hit by Helcurt leaves a <font color="a6aafb">dark fog</font> that explodes and spreads with a cooldown of 10s. Helcurt <font color="a6aafb">Conceals</font> himself while within the <font color="a6aafb">dark fog</font>.

<font color="a6aafb">Passive</font>: When Helcurt is in <font color="a6aafb">Prowler</font> state, the skill <font color="a6aafb">terrifies</font> enemy heroes hit and its cooldown decreases 3 times as fast as normal.
<font color="a6aafb">Active</font>: Helcurt blinks to the target location and deals 150<font color="fba51f"> (+70% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies within the area, reducing their Movement Speed by 60% for 0.75s.

<font color="a6aafb">Passive</font>: Helcurt gains one Deadly Stinger for every 1.5s spent in <font color="a6aafb">Prowler</font> state or on each Basic Attack. Up to 5 <font color="a6aafb">stingers</font> can be stored.
<font color="a6aafb">Active</font>: Helcurt fires all <font color="a6aafb">Deadly Stingers</font> forward, each dealing 180<font color="fba51f"> (+42% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies (Minions and Creeps take only 70% of the damage).
<font color="a6aafb">Deadly Stinger</font> counts as a Basic Attack but cannot Crit.

Helcurt summons the Dark Night, reducing all enemies' sight range and making them lose sight of their allies for 3s. During Dark Night, Helcurt gains 40% extra Movement Speed.

The Dark Night makes it easier for Helcurt to leave enemies' sight range.

data.name: Helcurt

__data.skilldesc:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldesc_text: Deal <Num1> [C5True Damage] to the target Creep or Minion.####[C2Passive]: Increases Creep rewards by <%Num2> and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by <%Num3>. Also grants <%Num5> additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first <Num4> min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first <Num6> min.####[C2Blessing:] Accumulate <Num8> Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldescemblem:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.

recommendmasterplan.description: Jungle: Use Ultimate to cut off enemy vision and burst down enemy heroes.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+14 Adaptive Penetration
+10 Adaptive Attack
+3% Movement Speed

emblemskill.skilldesc: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by 7%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by 7%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage greater than <%Num3> of an enemy hero's Max HP <Num2> times within <Num1>s will scorch the target for an additional <Num5> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Damage[-] (scales with level).########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num6>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
equiplist.equipskill2: Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+18 Extra Physical Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Lethality: After dealing damage to an enemy hero, executes the hero if their HP is lower than 4%. Gains 10 stack(s) of Lethality for each kill and loses 30% of current stack(s) for each death. Each stack of Lethality increases the HP threshold of the execute effect by 0.1%, stacking up to 80 times.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Lethality: After dealing damage to an enemy hero, executes the hero if their HP is lower than 4%. Gains 10 stack(s) of Lethality for each kill and loses 30% of current stack(s) for each death. Each stack of Lethality increases the HP threshold of the execute effect by 0.1%, stacking up to 80 times.
equiplist.equiptips:
+60 Adaptive Attack
+15 Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Corrosion: Basic Attacks gain 80 extra Physical Damage and slow the target by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacks up to 5 times.
equiplist.equipskill3: Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Corrosion: Basic Attacks gain 80 extra Physical Damage and slow the target by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacks up to 5 times.
Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equiptips:
+30 Extra Physical Attack
+5% Movement Speed
+30% Extra Attack Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160<font color="fba51f"> (+0.4 Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160<font color="fba51f"> (+0.4 Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+70 Extra Physical Attack
+250 Extra Max HP

equiplist.equipskill1: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+80 Extra Physical Attack
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Dragon Scale: Every 1% Lifesteal increases Hybrid Defense by 1, up to 50 (effect is halved for non-Fighter heroes).
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifeline: When taking damage that reduces HP below 30%, gain a 770(+70*Hero Level) shield and 50% Movement Speed that rapidly decays over 3s. This effect has a 60s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Dragon Scale: Every 1% Lifesteal increases Hybrid Defense by 1, up to 50 (effect is halved for non-Fighter heroes).
Lifeline: When taking damage that reduces HP below 30%, gain a 770(+70*Hero Level) shield and 50% Movement Speed that rapidly decays over 3s. This effect has a 60s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Extra Physical Attack
+20% Extra Attack Speed
+10% Lifesteal

equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+18 Extra Physical Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Lethality: After dealing damage to an enemy hero, executes the hero if their HP is lower than 4%. Gains 10 stack(s) of Lethality for each kill and loses 30% of current stack(s) for each death. Each stack of Lethality increases the HP threshold of the execute effect by 0.1%, stacking up to 80 times.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Lethality: After dealing damage to an enemy hero, executes the hero if their HP is lower than 4%. Gains 10 stack(s) of Lethality for each kill and loses 30% of current stack(s) for each death. Each stack of Lethality increases the HP threshold of the execute effect by 0.1%, stacking up to 80 times.
equiplist.equiptips:
+60 Adaptive Attack
+15 Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Corrosion: Basic Attacks gain 80 extra Physical Damage and slow the target by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacks up to 5 times.
equiplist.equipskill3: Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Corrosion: Basic Attacks gain 80 extra Physical Damage and slow the target by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacks up to 5 times.
Impulse: Basic Attacks grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s, capped at 5 stacks.
equiplist.equiptips:
+30 Extra Physical Attack
+5% Movement Speed
+30% Extra Attack Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160<font color="fba51f"> (+0.4 Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160<font color="fba51f"> (+0.4 Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+70 Extra Physical Attack
+250 Extra Max HP

equiplist.equipskill1: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+80 Extra Physical Attack
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Dragon Scale: Every 1% Lifesteal increases Hybrid Defense by 1, up to 50 (effect is halved for non-Fighter heroes).
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifeline: When taking damage that reduces HP below 30%, gain a 770(+70*Hero Level) shield and 50% Movement Speed that rapidly decays over 3s. This effect has a 60s cooldown.

Lifeline: When taking damage that reduces HP below 30%, gain a 770(+70*Hero Level) shield and 50% Movement Speed that rapidly decays over 3s. This effect has a 60s cooldown.

recommendmasterplan.name: SANTIE
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Coach

__data.skilldesc:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldesc_text: Deal <Num1> [C5True Damage] to the target Creep or Minion.####[C2Passive]: Increases Creep rewards by <%Num2> and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by <%Num3>. Also grants <%Num5> additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first <Num4> min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first <Num6> min.####[C2Blessing:] Accumulate <Num8> Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldescemblem:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.

recommendmasterplan.description: Jungle: Use Ultimate to cut off enemy vision and burst down enemy heroes.

emblemskill.skilldesc: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by 7%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: If there is only one enemy hero nearby, damage dealt to them is increased by 7%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage greater than <%Num3> of an enemy hero's Max HP <Num2> times within <Num1>s will scorch the target for an additional <Num5> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Damage[-] (scales with level).########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num6>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

recommendmasterplan.name: Paranoid Youtube
recommendmasterplan.title: Influencer

data.story: The nightmare of the Abyss who's willing to betray anyone in order to survive.

assist.desc: Helcurt's Ultimate is a great tool to obscure the enemy's vision and makes it easier for him and his team to engage. Additionally, heroes with CC like Tigreal, Esmeralda, and Terizla work great with Helcurt to secure kills.

strong.desc: Helcurt can swiftly approach enemies with his mobility and quickly take down heroes like Layla, Chang'e, and Vale with his burst damage.

weak.desc: Helcurt should avoid tank heroes that he can't burst down, such as Fredrinn, Belerick, and Gatotkaca. Once Helcurt is caught by their CC, they can make short work of him with their teammates.
